text: Miguel Boyer Salvador (5 February 1939 â€“ 29 September 2014) was a French-born Spanish economist and politician. He served as the Minister of Economy, Treasury and Commerce. He served as minister from 1982 to 1985. Boyer died of a pulmonary embolism after being admitted to the Ruber International Hospital in Madrid on 29 September 2014. He was 75. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Spanish politicians
title: Miguel Boyer
